[OBJECT:CREATURE]

[CREATURE:BULBASAUR]

[CREATURE:SPEAROW]
	[DESCRIPTION:An avian Pokemon that is very small. Although inept at other aspects of its flying, such as height and distance, Spearow is still capable of flying quickly to protect its territory.]
	[NAME:Spearow:Spearow:Pokemon]
	[CASTE_NAME:Spearow:Spearow:Pokemon]
	[CREATURE_TILE:'s'][COLOR:6:0:0]
	[PET][PETVALUE:100][NATURAL][APPLY_CREATURE_VARIATION:POKEBALL_WEAKNESS][TRAINABLE]
	[SOUND:ALERT:25:1000:VOCALIZATION:make your cry:makes its cry:a Spearow cry]
	[APPLY_CREATURE_VARIATION:HEAVYBALL_WEAKNESS-2]
	[FLIER]
	[PRONE_TO_RAGE:50]
	[GRASSTRAMPLE:0]
	[LARGE_ROAMING]
	[SKILL_LEARN_RATES:110]
	[DIFFICULTY:1]

		[DESCRIPTION:A bipedal, rodent-like Pokemon. By collecting its psychic power in its tail, it is able to ride it like a surfboard and float in the air. While its cheek sacs are still used to store electricity, rubbing them releases a sweet aroma.]

[CREATURE:PSYDUCK]
	[DESCRIPTION:A Pokemon that resembles a duck or bipedal platypus. Psyduck is constantly stunned by its headache and is unable to think very clearly. It usually stands immobile, trying to calm its headache. However, when its headache becomes too severe, it releases tension in the form of strong psychic powers.]
	[NAME:Psyduck:Psyduck:Pokemon]
	[CASTE_NAME:Psyduck:Psyduck:Pokemon]
	[CREATURE_TILE:'p'][COLOR:6:0:1]
	[PETVALUE:100][APPLY_CREATURE_VARIATION:POKEBALL_WEAKNESS][TRAINABLE][PET]
	[SOUND:ALERT:10:1000:VOCALIZATION:make your cry:makes its cry:a Psyduck cry]
	[APPLY_CREATURE_VARIATION:HEAVYBALL_WEAKNESS-2]
	[LARGE_ROAMING]
	[GRASSTRAMPLE:0]
	[NATURAL]
	[BENIGN]

[CREATURE:POLIWAG]
	[DESCRIPTION:A Pokemon that resembles a spherical tadpole. The direction of the belly spiral differs by area, with the equator being thought to have an effect on this.]

[CREATURE:POLIWHIRL]
	[DESCRIPTION:A bipedal Pokemon with a spherical body. It is always covered in an oily fluid that allows it to slip away from enemies. All of its skin feels this away except where its swirl is, which is very smooth.]
	[NAME:Poliwhirl:Poliwhirl:Pokemon]
	[CASTE_NAME:Poliwhirl:Poliwhirl:Pokemon]
	[CREATURE_TILE:237][COLOR:1:0:1]

	[POPULATION_NUMBER:25:50]

[CREATURE:TENTACRUEL]
	[DESCRIPTION:A large jellyfish-like Pokemon. Tentacruel's tentacles can be freely elongated and shortened, and can absorb water to stretch to some length. The tentacles are normally kept short, but on hunts, they are extended to ensnare and immobilize prey.]
	[NAME:Tentacruel:Tentacruel:Pokemon]
	[CASTE_NAME:Tentacruel:Tentacruel:Pokemon]
	[CREATURE_TILE:'T'][COLOR:3:0:0]
	[PETVALUE:150][APPLY_CREATURE_VARIATION:POKEBALL_WEAKNESS][TRAINABLE][PET][NATURAL]
	[SOUND:ALERT:10:1000:NONE:make your cry:makes its cry:a Tentacruel cry]
	[APPLY_CREATURE_VARIATION:HEAVYBALL_WEAKNESS-2]
	[LARGE_ROAMING]
	[LARGE_PREDATOR]

[CREATURE:KOFFING]
	[DESCRIPTION:A spherical Pokemon filled with toxic gasses. Koffing creates gases within its body by mixing toxins with garbage, and produces more gas in higher temperatures. These gases are malodorous and cause sniffles, coughs, and teary eyes to those around it.]
	[NAME:Koffing:Koffing:Pokemon]
	[CASTE_NAME:Koffing:Koffing:Pokemon]

[CREATURE:MR.MIME]
	[DESCRIPTION:A bipedal, humanoid Pokemon. From birth, this Pokemon is an excellent pantomime. As it matures, it gains the ability to solidify air molecules by vibrating its fingertips. This ability allows it to create invisible objects with its gestures.]
	[NAME:Mr. Mime:Mr. Mime:Pokemon]
	[CASTE_NAME:Mr. Mime:Mr. Mime:Pokemon]
